A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Non-consistent with anything Star Wars. It should have been named \"Guardians of the galaxy 3\". Then it would have made more sense. The Last Jedi is a complete travesty\, and for me\, the title is prophetic. It means it's the last ever Jedi movie I'll ever pay to see in a theatre. Good job\, Disney. I hope you got a good bunch of 7-10 years old kids to replace the millions of fans you just shit on. Boycott them\, it's all the power you have\, now\, my fellow betrayed force believer friends. So sad...
